text.0: hither he hastens to give lord of great riches king of the mighty to the place of treasure.
text.1: the pressingstones shall serve him speeding near us.
text.2: as steer of men so steer of earth and heaven by glory he whose streams all life hath drunken.
text.3: who hasting forward rests upon the altar.
text.4: he who hath lighted up the joyous castle wise courser like the steed of cloudy heaven.
text.5: bright like the sun with hundredfold existence.
text.6: he doubly born hath spread in his effulgence through the three luminous realms through all the regions.
text.7: best sacrificing priest where waters gather.
text.8: priest doubly born he through his love of glory hath in his keeping all things worth the choosing.
text.9: the man who brings him gifts hath noble offspring.
